guidanceModes.title: Guidance modes
guidanceModes.subtitle: Triangle of Flowing Energy
guidanceModes.selectPrompt: Tap a mode to explore how KIAAN guides your state.

innerPeace.title: Inner Peace
innerPeace.description: Find stillness through breath-focused exercises and gentle grounding techniques. Perfect for moments when you need to calm your mind and reconnect with tranquility.

mindControl.title: Mind Control
mindControl.description: Develop focused clarity through structured mindfulness practices. Ideal for decision-making, concentration, and maintaining inner discipline.
mindControl.note: Steady steps, one thought at a time

selfKindness.title: Self Kindness
selfKindness.description: Cultivate compassion for yourself through warm, supportive exercises. Essential for healing, self-acceptance, and nurturing your emotional well-being.

clarityPause.title: Clarity Pause
clarityPause.subtitle: Create space before you act.
clarityPause.description: No advice. Just space to decide from clarity.
clarityPause.note: KIAAN stays untouchedтАФdecline to pass through instantly.
clarityPause.question: Are you acting from clarity or from emotion right now?

responses.peaceful: I'm glad you're feeling calm тАФ stay with that softness for a moment. ЁЯТЩ
responses.happy: It's beautiful to see you feeling bright. Let that warmth stay with you. тЬи
responses.neutral: Steady is good. You're showing up, and that matters. ЁЯМ┐
responses.charged: That energy is powerful тАФ channel it wisely. тЪб
responses.open: Being open takes courage. I'm here to support you. ЁЯМдя╕П
responses.grateful: Gratitude is a gift to yourself. Hold onto this feeling. ЁЯЩП
responses.reflective: Reflection brings clarity. Take your time with what you're feeling. ЁЯкЮ
responses.determined: That fire in you is strong. Move forward with purpose. ЁЯФе
responses.tender: Tenderness is strength. Be gentle with yourself right now. ЁЯТЩ
responses.tired: Rest is not weakness. Your body is telling you something important. ЁЯШ┤
responses.anxious: That anxious feeling is tough тАФ take a breath, I'm with you. ЁЯМК
responses.heavy: I'm sorry you're feeling lowтАж you're not alone. I'm right here with you. ЁЯМзя╕П
responses.angry: It's okay тАФ anger means something important needs attention. I'm here beside you. ЁЯФе
responses.worried: Worry can feel overwhelming. Let's take this one step at a time together. ЁЯТн
responses.sad: Sadness is heavy, but you're not alone right now. I'm here with you. ЁЯТЩ
responses.lonely: Loneliness is tough, but you're not alone right now. I'm here with you. ЁЯдЭ
responses.depressed: This weight is real, and it's hard. Please reach out тАФ you don't have to carry this alone. ЁЯТЩ
